title: 118: Overcoming Addiction Holistically with Luke Storey
itunes:title: 118: Overcoming Addiction Holistically with Luke Storey
description:
If you/ anyone you love has battled with addiction, listen to this episode. Luke Storey suffered from an alcohol, cocaine, heroine and crack addiction for most of his youth. This left him vulnerable, depressed, anxious and lost on his path.

However, through meditation and healthy lifestyle, he has now overcome addictions and is 20 years sober (can you believe he’s in his mid 40’s?! Talk about amazing skin!)

He shares his incredible journey, which inspires all of us that anything is possible through a holistic lifestyle. We have him back on the next episode to share where he is now.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Join my Awaken Your Powers Masterclass to become a leader in the new paradigm with Shaman Durek: https://www.iamsahararose.com/awaken-your-powers


Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
